11 
12  nav_msgs::Path SimplePlanner::doPlan(std::vector<double> start, std::vector<double> goal)
13  {
14  std::cout << "computing path\n";
15  path_ = nav_msgs::Path();
16  // path_.header.frame_id = "map";
17 
18  Eigen::Isometry3d baseT(Eigen::Translation3d(start[0], start[1], start[2]) *
19  Eigen::AngleAxisd(start[3], Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
20  Eigen::Quaterniond baseq(baseT.rotation());
21  Eigen::Isometry3d goalT(Eigen::Translation3d(goal[0], goal[1], goal[2]) *
22  Eigen::AngleAxisd(goal[3], Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
23  Eigen::Quaterniond goalq(goalT.rotation());
24 
25  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
26  pose.pose.position.x = start[0];
27  pose.pose.position.y = start[1];
28  pose.pose.position.z = start[2];
29  pose.pose.orientation.x = baseq.x();
30  pose.pose.orientation.y = baseq.y();
31  pose.pose.orientation.z = baseq.z();
32  pose.pose.orientation.w = baseq.w();
33  path_.poses.push_back(pose);
34 
35  double dist = 0.3;
36 
37  auto diff = baseT.inverse() * goalT;
38  // direction vector from start to goal
39  Eigen::Vector3d dir = diff.translation();
40  // std::cout << dir.norm() << "\n";
41  int steps = dir.norm() / dist;
42  dir.stableNormalize();
43 
44  // forward
45  Eigen::Isometry3d fwd(Eigen::Translation3d(dir * 0.3));
46  // fwd = Eigen::Translation3d(dir * 0.3);
47  Eigen::Isometry3d next = baseT;
48 
49  Eigen::Quaterniond q(Eigen::AngleAxisd(atan2(dir[1], dir[0]), Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
50 
51  // Eigen::Quaterniond q(dir);
52  for (int i = 0; i < steps; i++)
53  {
54  next = next * fwd;
55 
56  pose = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
57  pose.pose.position.x = next.translation().x();
58  pose.pose.position.y = next.translation().y();
59  pose.pose.position.z = next.translation().z();
60 
61  // auto q = Eigen::Quaterniond(fwd.rotation());
62  pose.pose.orientation.x = q.x();
63  pose.pose.orientation.y = q.y();
64  pose.pose.orientation.z = q.z();
65  pose.pose.orientation.w = q.w();
66  path_.poses.push_back(pose);
67  }
68 
69  pose = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
70  pose.pose.position.x = goal[0];
71  pose.pose.position.y = goal[1];
72  pose.pose.position.z = goal[2];
73  pose.pose.orientation.x = goalq.x();
74  pose.pose.orientation.y = goalq.y();
75  pose.pose.orientation.z = goalq.z();
76  pose.pose.orientation.w = goalq.w();
77 
78  path_.poses.push_back(pose);
79 
80  std::cout << "done planning\n";
81 
82  return path_;
83  }
84 }
